definitions.title: et m.
definitions.body: :Job 28, 14 + 5 t. (Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 62 Kö:ii. 2. 167 Ency. Bib.:DEEP) deep, sea, abyss (almost alw. poet.);—abs. ´[[ת]]: Ge 1:2 +; pl. abs. [[תְּהׂמוֹת]] Ps 77:17 +, etc., ´[[בַּתּ]]: Is 63:13 PsalmPs 106:9 (only here c. art.); cstr. [[תְּהוֹמוֹת]] Ps 71:20 (but v.

(deep) sea, overwhelming Tyre Ez Eze 26:19 (‖[[הַמַּיִם הָרַבִּים ]]), roaring at theoph. Hb Hab 3:10; in gen., ‖[[יׇם ]], Job 38:30 (´[[פְּנֵי ת]]:); ‖[[מַיִם ]] Jon 2:6; alonE Job 41:24; fig., [[קוֹרַא]] ´[[אֶל־ת]] :´[[ת]]: Job 42:8 (‖[[מִשְׁבָּרִים ]], [[גַּלִּים]]; but poss. here of Jordan, cf.

); in pl. = abysses of sea, Ex 15:5, Ex 15:8 (of Red Sea, so) Is 63:13 ‖ Ps 106:9, Ps 77:17; also Ps 78:15 (in sim.), Ps 107:26 (poet. of hollows of great waves, opp. [[שָׁמַיִם]]); vaguely, [[כָּל־תְּהׂמוֹת]] Ps 135:6, Ps 148:7.

primaeval ocean, deep, in Heb. cosmogony, ´[[פְּנֵי ת]]: Ge 1:2 (P; ‖[[פְּנֵי הַמַּיִם ]]), Pr 8:27 (‖[[שָׁמַיִם ]]), Ps 104:6.—(Cf., further, Gunk:Schöpfung u. Chaos 21 ff. OCWhitehouse: Hast. DB COSMOGONY Zim:KAT3. 492 f., 509 f., 585).

deep, depth, of river Ez Eze 31:4 (Nile; ‖[[מַיִם ]], + [[נַהֲרוֹתֶיהָ]]), v:Eze 31:15 (‖ id.); pl. of bursts of water fertilizing Canaan, [[יוחאים]] [[בבקעה ובהר]] De 8:7 ( + [[עֲיׇנׁת]], [[נַחֲלֵי מַיִם]]).—On Ps 42:8 v.
abyss (si vera l.): [[תְּהוֹמוֹת הָאָרֶץ]] = She’ôl, Ps 71:20, but Ol We [[תַּחְתִיּוֹת]].
